entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.3°C

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 60 gusting to 90 this afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending early this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 early this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 30%
